title: Middle Wheeling Creek
text:
Middle Wheeling Creek is a long 3rd order tributary to <a href="Little%20Wheeling%20Creek">Little Wheeling Creek</a> in <a href="Ohio%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia">Ohio County, West Virginia</a>.
Course.
Middle Wheeling Creek rises about 3 miles southwest of <a href="Claysville%2C%20Pennsylvania">Claysville, Pennsylvania</a>, in <a href="Washington%20County%2C%20Pennsylvania">Washington County</a> and then flows west into <a href="Ohio%20County%2C%20West%20Virginia">Ohio County, West Virginia</a> to join Little Wheeling Creek in <a href="Triadelphia%2C%20West%20Virginia">Triadelphia</a>.
Watershed.
Middle Wheeling Creek drains of area, receives about 41.1 in/year of precipitation, has a wetness index of 295.46, and is about 61% forested.
